name: Brachiosaurus
description: A large, long-necked herbivorous dinosaur that lived during the Late Jurassic period.

name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
description: One of the most famous carnivorous dinosaurs, known for its large head and powerful jaws.

name: Triceratops
description: A herbivorous dinosaur recognizable by its three horns and large bony frill.

name: Velociraptor
description: A small but fast and intelligent carnivorous dinosaur, popularized by movies.
